Love Quentin & Charlette. This one was so good I couldn't put it down. Wow. I'm voluntarily leaving an honest review for a copy of the book.

Quentin used to be a rock star and fit into the lifestyle perfectly.  But he cleaned up his act and is now owner of his own business as CEO, is a single dad and is a good guy.  But when Charlotte comes as a intern for his firm, he wishes he hadn't set in place the no fraternisation policy as she is driving him nuts!!!  The attraction between them is off the charts and in this fast paced book by Kira Blakely we learn their journey to their own HEA. It is a terrific story that I really enjoyed with great characters - Quentin has still got that bit of rock star in him and he let's that free again when they meet.  The passion between them is RED HOT and all I'm going to say is fans/air cons on now - you know what I mean!  get ready to also fall in love with his daughter Morgan.  There is a fabulous extra bonus from Charlotte's POV, an exclusive book plus a bonus story which I'm going to enjoy reading.  I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.  But as I loved this story so much I bought my own copy and look forward to reading the extras plus Kira's next book!Definitely recommended - get a copy now to read!

** spoiler alert ** Reformed manwhore and drug addict, Quentin McDonnell now takes his job as chief editor and father seriously. Charlotte has dreamed of working for Mad Music Magazine since she was little and has always had a crush on Quentin. One rule stands in there way: no fraternizing between employees! Will Quentin and Charlotte be able to resist the pull between them? Will they be able to work out a way to be together?This book was hot! I was happy that Charlotte was able to pull Quentin back a couple of times when his past behavior popped up. Quentin drove me insane with his back and forth, BUT I understood why and I was honestly happy with his dedication to her once he gave into his feelings. Didn't like Pamela at all and would have loved to see something happen to her and Maggie! Great book and cannot wait for more from this author!

It’s a great written story, quite simple and sweet with some hot sex scenes. I liked the characters and their alchemy and the magnetism between them.Charlotte is an aspiring writer and she starts working as an intern in a music magazine. The boss is Quentin, an ex rockstar. Charlotte was a fan and she knows that since he’s a father, he stopped all exces. They’re attracted, but they try to resist because she wants to build her career by herself and if anyone knows she has a relation with Quentin, her career will be destroyed. Quentin doesn’t want to be involve even if she’s the only woman he's attracted to since the birth of his daughter. Despite this, he can’t stop to go to her.So between the company, his family and their love, it’s complicated.I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book

4 stars This was a very good contemporary writer/rockstar romance. Quentin was a rock star years ago and was into the drinking, drugs and women. Now in his 30's he's the editor of a music magazine. He has a 7 year old daughter he adores. Charlotte came from small town Ohio to become a writing intern at the same magazine. The moment they met they felt a change in themselves. Unfortunately, there's a no fraternization rule. Pasts, secrets and a whirlwind surprise romance keep the attention of the reader. I received a complementary copy of this book and chose to write a review. I look forward to reading future books by Ms. Blakely.

I want to shove her against the wall and f*ck the innocence right out of her.There's just one problem.She interns for my company and we have a no fraternizing policy.As a single dad, I don't have time to get wrapped up in scandal.This is going to be... hard!Imagine my shock, ok, desire, when I stumble upon her in the elevator where I live and find out she's just moved in.I can't take it anymore. Her firm bre@sts, peeking out beneath her business suit. Her bright smile, greeting me, making me hard the minute she looks at me.It's too much!This is so wrong. And WTF was I thinking making a no-fraternizing policy?Well, we know which head will win this battle. I've been wearing the good guy hat too long.F*ck being Mr. Nice Guy. Nice guys finish last.I'm going back to the old me. I'll show her what a real man is like.I'm going to finish. Again, and again.
In celebration of Father's Day, this newly revised insta-lust will have you wishing you were single. Totally over the top. Totally satisfying. AND if that's not enough to keep you hot and bothered, you'll get an extra scene with a twist from Charlotte's point of view. Exclusive new book and one bonus story inside! The main story is a 60k word full-length novel and ends at 34% on your Kindle.
title: One Hot Daddy: A Single Daddy Romance
